references: K. H. Rosen, Discrete Mathematics and Its Application, 6th Edition, McGraw-Hill, 2007, Ex. 26 of section 2.4.
formula: a(0) = 0, a(1) = 1, a(n) = 2*a(n-1) - a(n-2) if n not a perfect cube, else a(n) = 2*a(n-1) - a(n-2) + 1 if n is a perfect cube.a(n) = -1/4*floor(n^(1/3))*(floor(n^(1/3))^3+2*floor(n^(1/3))^2+floor(n^(1/3))-4*(n+1)). - _John M. Campbell_, Mar 22 2016
prog: (PARI) a(n) = sum(k=1, n, sqrtnint(k, 3)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Mar 12 2016
author: Michel Tixier (tixier(AT)dyadel.net)
